articles.title: Jake Paul outpoints Nate Diaz then calls for rematch in MMA - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Jake Paul dropped Nate Diaz in the fifth round and went on to score a unanimous-decision win in their boxing showdown then challenged him afterward to an MMA fight.
articles.content:
DALLAS -- In Jake Paul's war against MMA fighters, he remains undefeated.
